entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 25. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of light snow. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 37 in the morning and minus 29 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 34.
entry.summary: Clearing late in the evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 34. Wind chill minus 28 in the evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 26 February 2023
